task.title: Changing the current branch
task.shortdesc: If you want to work on topics and maps in a different branch, you can select that branch from the view toolbar.

prereq.p: If the current branch has any unstaged changes, commit your modifications or discard them entirely.

step.cmd: In the view toolbar, click the Change Branch icon.
In the Select Branch dialog box, select the branch that you want to check out and click OK.

info.note: If the files that are currently open in one or more editor tabs do not exist or are in different state in the branch that you selected, may prompt you to reload or close the affected tabs.

result.p: The selected branch is now checked out in your local repository.
